name: Super Lieutenant 001: The Summer Soldier
description:
Synopsis

A military-themed shoot 'em up heavily inspired by the Metal Slug series, released for the arcades during the 90s'. Lead your army to victory by controlling the ultimate soldier, who has remarkable skills in combat. Make your way through hordes of enemies, and destroy them as you move forward in this side-scroller game!

Controls
  • Left / Right Arrows: Move
  • Up Arrow: Aim Upwards (Hold)
  • Down Arrow: Crouch (Hold)
  • A: Shoot
  • S: Jump
  • D: Stab
  • W: Reload
  • E: Throw Grenade
